post.text: "We are black, we are proud, and here's why we are working to elect Hillary." Hillary for America staffers on why they're with her: hrc.io/2dCzSXz

comment.author: Timothy
comment.text: I was 16, working at a car wash in DC. 1997 Mrs. Clinton showed to have her BMW washed that day as she stated to my boss Gary, she had an important brunch meeting with a current senator at the time. Senator of Va. I over heard her say. Gary told her no problem Mrs. Clinton we'll have her ready in no time. Gary called my friend Jamal and I over to the car, I didnt have a license yet so Jamal would drive the cars around and we would detail them. As we approached Mrs. Clinton and her car she turned to Gary and said "NO. I will not allow a Monkey Jigaboo to touch my car".. Gary side eye'd her with a very distinct look. Though he never responded to the comment he adv dereck to move the car around and as I walked away Mrs. Clinton then slapped my butt and said "Make it shine, cutie". I felt violated. And I told my guardian and they did nothing. But I am here to tell you now. She is a Snake, the antichrist and NOT the womens she claims. And yes everything I have stated is 100% FACT. This copied comment came from a man who used to work at a car wash in DC in 1997.

replies.author: Benjamin
replies.text: OMG, is it possible that Ms Clinton is a pervert? Please God, help that poor fellow who worked at the car wash.

replies.author: Timothy
replies.text: Never mind the car wash guy, it's her calling Jamal a monkey jigaboo that's repulsive.
